TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XPathMessageQueryCollection extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQueryCollection

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about message queries, see the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQuery> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQueryCollection> classes.
## Examples The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. The queries are evaluated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery> objects contained in an XPathMessageQueryCollection object. The results of each query are tested using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult.ResultType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult> class.
[!code-vb[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.servicemodel.di_9_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.servicemodel.di_9_1.cs)]
